readme_content:
Hey there! I'm Ananthan


### 🧑‍💻  About Me
  👀   I’m interested in AI & Blockchain Technology   💻   I like to build things, learn how things works & build em.   🎓   I have done M.Phil Degree in Computer Science from CUSAT.   🌱   Currently working on GraphML for Blockchain Data Analysis.   ✍️   In my free time, I pursue 3D Design and Read Light Novels.   💬   Feel free to reach out to me.

  [![Telegram](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ananthanir/ananthanir/dd73d691b8b71ac4eda23d1a655a822653e26f92/telegram.svg)](https://t.me/ananthanir) [![Twitter](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ananthanir/ananthanir/dd73d691b8b71ac4eda23d1a655a822653e26f92/twitter.svg)](https://twitter.com/ananthanigr)

### 🛠  Web App Development Tech Stack   ![JavaScript](https://img.shields.io/badge/-JavaScript-05122A?style=flat&logo=javascript)  ![React](https://img.shields.io/badge/-React-05122A?style=flat&logo=react)  ![Node.js](https://img.shields.io/badge/-Node.js-05122A?style=flat&logo=node.js)  ![Bootstrap](https://img.shields.io/badge/-Bootstrap-05122A?style=flat&logo=bootstrap&logoColor=563D7C) ![HTML](https://img.shields.io/badge/-HTML-05122A?style=flat&logo=HTML5)  ![CSS](https://img.shields.io/badge/-CSS-05122A?style=flat&logo=CSS3&logoColor=1572B6)  ![Git](https://img.shields.io/badge/-Git-05122A?style=flat&logo=git)  ![GitHub](https://img.shields.io/badge/-GitHub-05122A?style=flat&logo=github)  ![Visual Studio Code](https://img.shields.io/badge/-Visual%20Studio%20Code-05122A?style=flat&logo=visual-studio-code&logoColor=007ACC)  ### ⚙️  GitHub Analytics

ananthanir/sampleDappDB.summary: Recent activities on this repository include multiple push events, focusing on fixing and refining the codebase. Notable updates involve removing unused files and components, integrating corrections, and fixing various issues to improve the overall functionality and efficiency of the project.

Kerala-Blockchain-Academy/light-explorer.summary: Significant activities have taken place in this repository, including the migration of the project to pnpm, Vite, and Node 20. Additionally, there have been efforts to fix potential errors, ensuring object properties are defined, and updates to the API URL for local environments, contributing to the stability and performance of the explorer.

ananthanir/besu.summary: This repository has seen substantial activity, particularly with a large push event that introduced numerous enhancements and fixes. Updates include simplifying protocol context creation, consolidating metric collectors, adding support for TransactionPoolService in acceptance tests, and several other improvements to streamline and robustify the Besu project.

profile_summary: I'm Ananthan, a detail-oriented developer with a strong foundation in JavaScript, Go, and Kotlin, and a keen interest in AI and Blockchain Technology. With a Master's degree in Computer Science and a passion for building innovative solutions, I'm currently exploring GraphML for Blockchain Data Analysis. As a dedicated developer with 58 public repositories and a growing network of 43 followers, I'm excited to collaborate and bring new ideas to life.
